address_validation.EMPTY_ACCOUNT: This address has no funds. Please check if this address is correct.

wallets.remove_all_wallets_description: You're about to disconnect all your wallets. Keep in mind that you will need your seed phrases or private keys to connect them again.
wallets.remove_wallet_description: You're about to remove this wallet. Keep in mind that, to use it again, you will need to re-select it from derivables, or use your seed phrase.
wallets.edit_name_disclaimer: Keep in mind that this name works locally for you to easily identify your wallet. None of this data is reflected on the blockchain.

addressbook.label: Label
addressbook.empty:
Looks empty in here.
Add your first contact clicking the button.

receive.title: Receive
receive.warning: This address is for tokens on the {{chain}} blockchain. Please, do not send any other tokens as it may result in funds loss.

amount.invalid: The amount must be greater than 0

send.transaction_bridge_success:
Transaction pending, this could take a few minutes.
Head to your Wallet Overview section to keep track of the status.
send.transaction_fail:
Transaction failed.
Please try again later.
send.empty_account_fee: It is not possible to estimate the fee because the destination account is empty

balance.percentage_info: Variation of your position in the last 24 hours.

lock.title: Enter your password
lock.forgot_content:
Salmon does not store any information of your account. That includes your password. If you forgot it, you will need to disconnect all your wallets. Keep in mind that to re-import them you will need your seedphrase or private key.

Are you sure you want to proceed?

create.messageBody:
You will need these words to restore your wallet if your browser's storage is cleared or your device is damaged or lost. 

 Never share your seed phrase (or your private keys) with anyone or enter it into any form, as it provides full control of your wallet. 

 Salmon Team will never ask for your recovery phrase or private keys.
create.your_seed_phrase_body: Make sure you save the following words in a safe place. Also, keep in mind that the position of each word is important.
create.confirm_seed_phrase_body: Please re-enter the following words of the seed phrase to confirm that you have saved it.
create.wrong_password: Password must be between 8 and 20 characters
create.choose_a_password_body: You will need it to unlock your wallet
create.i_accept_terms_conditions:
By tapping the Create Wallet button 
I accept the Terms & Conditions
create.derivable_description: Derivables are "sub accounts" that are born from the same seed phrase. Using cryptography, the seed phrase it combined with a derivation path to create these different accounts. It allows the generation of as many accounts as you wish to have under the same seed phrase.

recover.messageBody: Recover your wallet using your 12/24 words seed phrase.
recover.i_accept_terms_conditions:
By tapping the Recover Wallet button 
I accept the Terms & Conditions

onboarding.select_blockchain_text:
Keep in mind that the wallet you are about to create will only work in that particular blockchain.
You can add other blockchains later from this same menu.
onboarding.content1:
Your all-in-one & open-source wallet
for the crypto space
onboarding.title2:
Keep the control
of your tokens
onboarding.content2:
All your assets, in your hands.
We don’t have access to them at all.

connection.title: Allow this site to connect?
connection.advice: Only connect with sites you trust.
connection.advice2: Nevertheless, your approval will be requested to complete any transaction.

banner.message: Please, keep this window open in the background

transaction.title: Transaction Review
transaction.warning: Transaction could not be verified. You can try again or proceed without verification.
transaction.caution: Salmon believes this transaction is malicious and unsafe to sign. We recommend not to proceed with it as it may result in fund loss.
transaction.proceed_anyway: I understand the risk, proceed anyway

nft.success_list: Your NFT has been listed in
nft.success_unlist: Your NFT has been unlisted from
